On 3/18/10 8:13 AM, "Lars O. Grobe" <grobe@gmx.net> wrote:

Further to this, I was wondering if I could volunteer to update the main
site menu to include info about the 2009 workshop. Christoph and Kera put up
a great page on the Harvard GSD site with all the presentations, but it
would be good to link to it from the side menu on radiance-online.org.

- Rob
